Package wbs.utils.util.pluginhooks

Class VaultWrapper

java.lang.Object
wbs.utils.util.pluginhooks.VaultWrapper
public final class VaultWrapper extends Object
A simple wrapper for common Vault methods, to avoid needing to set up Economy in every plugin
